mean_cn: n. 运输，运输工具，财产让与
mean_en: something that carries people or things from one place to another
word_etyma: convey运输 + ance名词后缀 → conveyance 运输
short_phrase: means of conveyance like trucks and airplanes
sentence: There are many different means of conveyance - cars, trucks, planes, and so on.
sentence_trans: 运输工具多种多样，汽车、卡车、飞机等等。
